name: Lyria Voss
title: The Fractured Mind
description: A temporal mage experiencing nonlinear time. The Marsh amplifies her abilities and her instability. She sees futures that haven't happened and pasts that were erased.

archetypes.name: Astral
archetypes.description: Scaling cosmic damage that builds over time

lore: Soft-spoken, eerie, insightful, fragmented. Lyria speaks as if she's holding multiple conversations at once. Her warnings are often cryptic because she's not sure which timeline she's describing.

uniqueResource.name: Astral Charge
uniqueResource.description: Empowers Astral abilities. Consumed by finishers.
